title: Clean Freak! Aoyama-kun
resume: The handsome young soccer genius named Aoyama is a Japan representative. His play style is "cleanliness". He doesn't tackle and doesn't head the ball. If he's doing a throw-in, he'll only do it if he's wearing gloves.
